decisionVelocityModel.name: Decision Velocity Model™
decisionVelocityModel.description: Measures cognitive processing speed from stimulus to response to identify performance bottlenecks
decisionVelocityModel.methodology: Quantifies decision-making speed and efficiency across organizational levels
decisionVelocityModel.scoring: 1-10 scale based on information processing, execution speed, and outcome quality

patternRecognitionHierarchy.name: Pattern Recognition Hierarchy™
patternRecognitionHierarchy.description: Deconstructs how elite performers filter signal from noise in data-saturated environments

cognitiveLoadDistribution.name: Cognitive Load Distribution™
cognitiveLoadDistribution.description: Examines how champions allocate mental resources under pressure and information overload

implementation.assessment: Comprehensive organizational analysis using all three frameworks

contact.tagline: Every stat tells a story, every game builds a legacy
